scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../scraping && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../scraping && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test && cd ../scraping && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
